caller_intent: Jeff Edmonds requested a special events insurance quote for a three-day event involving parking direction at a dedicated lot.
resolution_steps: Mike confirmed the nature of the event (parking direction, no vehicle operation).
Mike checked internal systems to verify coverage for the specific exposure.
Mike informed Jeff that Alliance Insurance Services does not cover parking direction under their special events product.
Mike clarified that coverage is available for hosts/vendors selling goods/services at events, but not for parking exposure.
knowledge_required: Differentiation between covered and excluded event types
summary: Jeff requested insurance for a parking-direction event, but Mike explained Alliance Insurance Services cannot cover this exposure. The agent clarified coverage limitations and suggested alternative event types that would qualify for their special events product.
